member.name: M:NDataAudit.Framework.AuditTest.#ctor
member.summary: Empty constructor

member.name: P:NDataAudit.Framework.AuditTest.ColumnName
member.summary: The name of the table column to test.

member.name: P:NDataAudit.Framework.AuditTest.Criteria
member.summary: Text to use in the where clause that will be built from this test.
member.remarks: Check the property to see the full query used to validate this test.

member.name: P:NDataAudit.Framework.AuditTest.FailIfConditionIsTrue
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [fail if condition is true].
member.value: true if [fail if condition is true]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NDataAudit.Framework.AuditTest.Instructions
member.summary: Gets or sets the instructions for the people receiving the email.
member.value: The instructions on what is actually happening. It may include how to fix the issue.

member.name: P:NDataAudit.Framework.AuditTest.Operator
member.summary: The operator symbol that will be used with the property.
member.remarks: This will be used in conjunction with the , , and properties.

member.name: P:NDataAudit.Framework.AuditTest.RowCount
member.summary: How many rows were returned from using the root SQL code.

member.name: P:NDataAudit.Framework.AuditTest.SendReport
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [send report].

member.name: P:NDataAudit.Framework.AuditTest.SqlStatementToCheck
member.summary: The SQL statement that gets built from the audit object properties.

member.name: P:NDataAudit.Framework.AuditTest.TemplateColorScheme
member.summary: Gets or sets the template color scheme for the data HTML table in emails.

member.name: P:NDataAudit.Framework.AuditTest.TestFailedMessage
member.summary: Stores any error message from exceptions. This is mostly to get a verbose description of the failure.

member.name: P:NDataAudit.Framework.AuditTest.TestReturnedRows
member.summary: Whether or not to test the rows that may get returned.

member.name: P:NDataAudit.Framework.AuditTest.UseCriteria
member.summary: Whether or not to use the criteria set for this audit test.

member.name: P:NDataAudit.Framework.AuditTest.WhereClause
member.summary: A where clause that will be added to the root SQL code. This is only done for this test.
